publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3958 Linda Fabiani: Scottish Government and STUC—That the Parliament notes the support of the Scottish Trades Union Congress (STUC) for the Scottish Government’s plans for a Scottish Investment Bank; welcomes the engagement of the STUC with the Scottish Government on this issue, and notes the STUC’s support for the Scottish Government’s position on the budget of HM Treasury.

S3M-3958 Scottish Government and STUC (lodged on 22 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Alasdair Allan*, Brian Adam*, Aileen Campbell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*, Sandra White*, Stuart McMillan*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bill Kidd*, Christina McKelvie*

*S3M-3958 Linda Fabiani: Scottish Government and STUC—That the Parliament notes the support of the Scottish Trades Union Congress (STUC) for the Scottish Government’s plans for a Scottish Investment Bank; welcomes the engagement of the STUC with the Scottish Government on this issue, and notes the STUC’s support for the Scottish Government’s position on the budget of HM Treasury. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Alasdair Allan, Brian Adam, Aileen Campbell, Kenneth Gibson, Rob Gibson, Sandra White, Stuart McMillan, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Bill Kidd, Christina McKelvie, Maureen Watt*, Bill Wilson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Michael Matheson*, Ian McKee*
S3M-3958 Scottish Government and STUC (lodged on 22 April 2009) Dave Thompson*
S3M-3958 Scottish Government and STUC (lodged on 22 April 2009) Bob Doris*
S3M-3958 Scottish Government and STUC (lodged on 22 April 2009) Lewis Macdonald*
S3M-3958 Scottish Government and STUC (lodged on 22 April 2009) Hugh Henry*
